hero.name: Andrew
hero.title: Software Developer Junior
hero.description: I build scalable web applications, enterprise systems, and automation solutions with a focus on performance and user experience.

about.title: About me
about.description: I am a software developer junior with experience in building web systems, API integrations, and process automation. I love solving real problems with clean code and efficient architectures.

project1.title: Workshop Inventory App
project1.description: Inventory management system with stock control, CRUD, authentication and admin dashboard. Built with React, Node.js and MySQL.
project1.problem: Optimizes parts and products control in auto repair shops, reducing losses and streamlining management.

project2.title: Real Estate Landing Pages
project2.description: Conversion-optimized landing pages for real estate, with forms connected to backend and automatic email sending.
project2.problem: Increases lead capture and communication efficiency with prospects interested in properties.

project3.title: Tourism Complaints System
project3.description: Complete platform for complaint management with user registration, admin panel, reports and security. Final degree project.
project3.problem: Helps travel agencies manage complaints and claims, improving customer response.
